name: Short red and clear colors
description: Set the balls as illustrated and start pot the red. Forces you into making good position on the next shot. Concentrate!

name: Long red and clear colors
description: Set the balls as illustrated and start pot the red. Forces you into making good position on the next shot. Concentrate!

name: 21 blue pots
description: Set the blue ball on your place. From yellow spot and green spot try to pot the blue ball.

name: 8 black balls
description: Pot the eight black balls from eight positions from the cushion. Requires concentration.

name: Escape from the snooker
description: Escape from the snooker, from behind the green ball to hit the pack on two cushions. Improves safety play and escapes snooker.

name: Escape from the snooker
description: Escape from the snooker, from behind the yellow ball to hit the pack on one cushion. Improves safety play and escapes snooker.

name: Pot the reds +20
description: Try to pot as many reds in a row as possible. Start from anywhere. Remember - you must pot a different red each time. Required exacting positional play.

name: Pot the reds +100
description: Try to pot as many reds in a row as possible. Start from anywhere. Remember - you must pot a different red each time. Required exacting positional play.
